Music & Performing Arts/Sidney Myer Music Bowl (Melbourne, Vic.)
description: A Hi5 Christmas extravaganza! The usual features of a Hi5 television program with the bonus of a live Christmas concert performed in front of an audience at the Sidney Myer Music Bowl in Melbourne. Can be viewed by pressing Play or by selecting the profiles for each group member: Charli, Nathan, Kathleen, Tim or Kellie. Includes "Body move", "Shapes in space", "Puzzles and patterns", "Making music" and "Word play". Suitable for very young children or early primary school age. Created by Helena Harris and Posie Graeme-Evans.
